Detailed Description

Class for managing TCP server sockets.

u_int32_t  m = DEFAULT_MAXCON,

) throw ()

ServerSocket high-level constructor.

Parameters:
port Port the server will listen onto
m Maximum number of allowed connections (default = DEFAULT_MAXCON)
addr Address the socket will listen from, as string (default = INADDR_ANY)

Member Function Documentation

void usock::ServerSocket::accept ( void(*)(Socket &s)  handler  )  throw ()

Wrap around accept() function, allowing you to manage multiple connection on your server socket, with a process for each of them.

Parameters:
handler Pointer to the function that will be called to manage each connection. The socket parameter s in it will be the descriptor of the client socket just opened

Socket usock::ServerSocket::accept (  )  throw ()

Wrap around accept() function.

Returns:
A Socket object identifying the client connection, if successfully built
